name: zigStructPrint
description: Small library to pretty-print Zig structs (and arrays)

releases.name: Last version supporting Zig older than 0.14.0-dev.1421+f87dd43c1
releases.body:
This is the last version to support Zig older than 0.14.0-dev.1421+f87dd43c1, such as Zig **0.12.0**, **0.12.1**, **0.13.0**, and **0.14.0-dev.91+a154d8da8**.

The reason to stop supporting them is because of the [breaking change](https://github.com/ziglang/zig/commit/0fe3fd01ddc2cd49c6a2b939577d16b9d2c65ea9) in Zig standard library, in std.builtin.Type - its fields were renamed.

If you need to use **zigStructPrint** with the current dev build of Zig (0.14.0-dev.1421+f87dd43c1 or later), do not use this version. Get the latest version instead.
